original_title: The Ukulele Orchestra of Great Britain - Anarchy in The Ukulele
overview: A concert recorded live at The Barbican, London UK. The nearest thing yet to experiencing the ukes live show without actually being there. Includes "Smells Like Teen Spirit", "McArthur Park" and the handbell/ukulele ringers version of "You don't bring me flowers".
title: The Ukulele Orchestra of Great Britain - Anarchy in The Ukulele
